quote.registrar: Computershare Hong Kong Investor Services Ltd.
quote.summary: Jiu Rong Holdings Ltd is an investment holding company principally engaged in manufacturing and sale of digital televisions (TV). The Company operates through five segments. The Digital Video Business segment engages in manufacturing and sales of TV, high definition liquid crystal display TV and set-top box as well as provision of application of solutions regarding integration of tele-communication, TV and internet. The New Energy Vehicles Business segment engages in construction, application and management of new energy vehicles and related products, charging facilities and intelligent management systems and processing services in relation to new energy vehicles spare parts. The Cloud Ecological Big Data Business segment engages in application and management of cloud ecological big data industry. The Properties Development segment engages in properties development of industrial park and sale of construction materials. The Properties Investment segment engages in properties rental.
